front.title: A YANG Data Model for Resource Reservation Protocol (RSVP)

abstract.t: This document defines a YANG data model for the configuration and management of RSVP Protocol. The model defines generic RSVP protocol building blocks that can be augmented and used by other RSVP extension models such as RVSP extensions to Traffic-Engineering (RSVP-TE). The model covers the RSVP protocol configuration, operational state, remote procedural calls, and event notifications data.
